system.description: You send a hideous and unsettling phantasmal vision to a subject you know. The subject recognizes the nightmare as unreal and takes 1d10 points of damage. The nightmare prevents restful sleep; the subject does not get the benefit of rest and is fatigued. The nightmare leaves the subject unable to regain arcane spells for the next 8 hours. If the subject is awake when you cast the spell, they know someone tried to contact them. The spell has no effect on a subject that does not sleep.

components.materialDescription: A handful of sand, a drop of ink, and a small feather (quill).

system.target: One living creature known to you
